ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
Convinced that his parents’ death wasn’t an accident, ex CIA agent Ward Hopkins is obsessed with finding the people responsible for their murder. But his investigation only uncovers more questions about his own mysterious past and his connection to the elusive STRAW MEN. Meanwhile the notorious serial killer known as the Upright Man continues to terrorize his latest victim, Sarah Becker. Will Ward be able to put all the pieces together in time to uncover the secret of the Straw Men and save Sarah from her fate at the hands of their deadliest member, the Upright Man? The clock is ticking and Sarah’s time is about to run out.
